quote: Acting is not about being famous, it's about exploring the human soul.
name: Annette Bening

quote: The world's most famous and popular language is music.
name: Psy

quote: My dear Mama, you are definitely the hen who hatched a famous duck.
name: Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec

quote: Fame is a fickle food upon a shifting plate.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Don't pay any attention to what they write about you. Just measure it in inches.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: In the future, everyone will be famous for 15 minutes.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: Glory is fleeting, but obscurity is forever.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: If you chase fame, you make bad choices. Being famous isn't interesting.
name: Justin Theroux

quote: I'm an instant star. Just add water and stir.
name: David Bowie

quote: Avoid popularity; it has many snares, and no real benefit.
name: William Penn

quote: The more they applaud, the bigger your salary will be.
name: Anna Held

quote: I imagined being a famous writer would be like being like Jane Austen.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: We all want to be famous people, and the moment we want to be something we are no longer free.
name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: I don't want to be famous. I like to be able to sit in a cafe and watch the world go by and observe people.
name: Sophia Myles

quote: I'm more interested in being good than being famous.
name: Annie Leibovitz

quote: A chair is a very difficult object. A skyscraper is almost easier. That is why Chippendale is famous.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: The fame thing is interesting because I never wanted to be famous, and I never dreamt I would be famous.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: I pretended to be somebody I wanted to be until finally I became that person. Or he became me.
name: Cary Grant

quote: I never wanted to be famous. I only wanted to be great.
name: Ray Charles

quote: Computers are famous for being able to do complicated things starting from simple programs.
name: Seth Lloyd

quote: To be famous, in fact, one has only to kill one's landlady.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Fame is the thirst of youth.
name: Lord Byron

quote: I'm bored with that line. I never use it anymore. My new line is 'In 15 minutes everybody will be famous.'
name: Andy Warhol

quote: I don't like being famous - it is like a prison. And driving for Ferrari would make it far worse.
name: Valentino Rossi

quote: We don't feel like we're famous. We just feel like we're doing what we love.
name: Sasha Banks

quote: My buildings are more famous than me.
name: Jean Nouvel

quote: When you become famous, being famous becomes your profession.
name: James Carville

quote: I'm kinda famous for my barbecues - I'm always hosting parties.
name: Bonnie McKee

quote: I love being famous - it's phenomenal.
name: Dave Chappelle

quote: I wanted to have money; I wanted to be special; I wanted people to like me; I wanted to be famous.
name: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: The worst thing about being famous is the invasion of your privacy.
name: Justin Timberlake

quote: Being rich and famous isn't all happiness and at times the pressures have got to me.
name: Frida Lyngstad

quote: For famous men have the whole earth as their memorial.
name: Pericles

quote: Other famous men, those of much talk and few deeds, soon evaporate. Action is the dignity of greatness.
name: Jose Marti

quote: I told myself repeatedly, 'One day you will be famous.'
name: Yves Saint Laurent

quote: I'm like a famous person to some people, not to everybody. I want to be big.
name: PnB Rock

quote: I had a flight trainer who is one of the biggest and most famous helicopter pilots the world.
name: Izabella Scorupco

quote: Having bodyguards is just part of being famous, I think.
name: Dolph Lundgren

quote: I've never seen the allure of being famous, because I know what that's like. It's part of work.
name: Jillian Hervey

quote: Persons famous in the arts partake of the immortality of princes, and are upon a footing with them.
name: Francis I

quote: Yeah, I love being famous. It's almost like being white, y'know?
name: Chris Rock

quote: You aren't famous until my mother has heard of you.
name: Jay Leno

quote: You don't have to have an attitude if you're famous.
name: Adriana Lima

quote: I'll be the songwriter for pop stars and then they can be the front person and I don't have to be famous.
name: Sia

quote: None of my characters are rich or famous, and the situations they find themselves in could happen to anyone.
name: Nicholas Sparks

quote: I will either be famous or infamous.
name: Otto Dix

quote: To be famous and broke is hard.
name: David Spade

quote: The nice thing about being a celebrity is that, if you bore people, they think it's their fault.
name: Henry Kissinger

quote: Martyrdom: The only way a man can become famous without ability.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: What a heavy burden is a name that has become too famous.
name: Voltaire

quote: Celebrity was a long time in coming; it will go away. Everything goes away.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Sometimes I wonder if I'm as famous for my wheelchair and disabilities as I am for my discoveries.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: I'm gonna be famous forever.
name: Cardi B

quote: Martyrdom is the only way a man can become famous without ability.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: My idea of a good picture is one that's in focus and of a famous person.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: I never thought I was going to be popular; I never thought I was going to be famous.
name: Cardi B

quote: Fame is like caviar, you know - it's good to have caviar but not when you have it at every meal.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I do not like the man who squanders life for fame; give me the man who living makes a name.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Celebrity is the chastisement of merit and the punishment of talent.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: I think that when you are famous every weakness is exaggerated.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Before I was famous, when I was just working in Gilbert's Lodge, everything was moving in slow motion.
name: Eminem

quote: I don't think I could think of a single thing that's more isolating than being famous.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: I was obsessed with being rich and famous.
name: Paul Lynde

quote: Everybody think they're famous when they get 100,000 followers on Instagram and 5,000 on Twitter.
name: Meek Mill

quote: Passion for fame: A passion which is the instinct of all great souls.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: A celebrity is one who is known to many persons he is glad he doesn't know.
name: Lord Byron

quote: It's too late for me to get married before I'm famous. You never know people's intentions.
name: Carmelo Anthony

quote: The same people who can deny others everything are famous for refusing themselves nothing.
name: Leigh Hunt

quote: I'd rather be able to face myself in the bathroom mirror than be rich and famous.
name: Ani DiFranco

quote: There's more pressure to be famous for being yourself than if you're being a character.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: I'm not looking to be famous, but I want a body of work and a moral character that is deserving of fame.
name: Jonathan Tucker

quote: Andy Warhol made fame more famous.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Many incredible artists die before they were famous.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: I want to become more famous, even more famous.
name: Yayoi Kusama

quote: I think Princess Diana probably had the most famous haircut, or Farrah Fawcett or Jennifer Aniston.
name: Dorothy Hamill

quote: I didn't set out to be famous; if I'd wanted that, I would have gone on 'Big Brother.'
name: Sam Worthington

quote: I've never worried about being rich or famous - for me, it's all about the dancing.
name: Anton du Beke

quote: For a time, at least, I was the most famous person in the entire world.
name: Jesse Owens

quote: You can become famous but you can't become unfamous. You can become infamous but not unfamous.
name: Dave Chappelle

quote: Fame can take interesting men and thrust mediocrity upon them.
name: David Bowie

quote: Fate is being kind to me. Fate doesn't want me to be too famous too young.
name: Duke Ellington

quote: Joanne' is a progression for me. It was about going into the studio and forgetting that I was famous.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: Stardom can be a gilded slavery.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: I'd be happy if anyone wore my fragrance. They don't have to be famous.
name: Shawn Mendes

quote: If you're famous, you suck, just for being famous. People in England totally get that; Americans don't.
name: Trey Parker

quote: I think people I'm close to find it absolutely crazy that I'm famous.
name: Zayn Malik

quote: Among famous traitors of history one might mention the weather.
name: Ilka Chase

quote: I've always strived to be successful, not famous.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: You get to be famous or have some notoriety and there are so many people who want a piece of you.
name: Oscar De La Hoya

quote: Exposure makes you famous, not just good work. Famous is being plastered everywhere.
name: Francesca Annis

quote: I have as much privacy as a goldfish in a bowl.
name: Princess Margaret

quote: In the beginning, I loved being famous, but now I am tired of it and I would like to go back to my freedom.
name: Roberto Cavalli

quote: Being famous before you've formed your personality, before you have that self-esteem, is dangerous.
name: Chris Evert

quote: The most famous Obama precept is, 'No drama.'
name: Daniel Pfeiffer

quote: It was I who made Fellini famous, not the other way around.
name: Anita Ekberg

quote: I love being famous. It's almost like being white.
name: Chris Rock

quote: Being famous is complete luck, and that's something you can't bank on.
name: Bo Burnham

quote: I'm famous today. People like me today. Might not like me tomorrow. You can't count on it.
name: Dave Chappelle

quote: The hardest thing about being famous is that people are always nice to you.
name: Robert De Niro

quote: How many famous and high-spirited heroes have lived a day too long?
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: A sign of celebrity is that his name is often worth more than his services.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: I want to get so famous that I don't have to wake up in the morning. It'll probably never happen.
name: Gabriel Iglesias

quote: Sometimes you forget you're famous. You wonder, 'Why is that person staring at me?'
name: Bob Newhart

quote: Don't worry about writing a book or getting famous or making money. Just lead an interesting life.
name: Michael Morpurgo

quote: I made the Yankee hat more famous than a Yankee can.
name: Jay-Z

quote: Even as a kid, I never wanted to be famous; I wanted to be good.
name: Neil Peart

quote: What's the name of that famous museum in Paris? The Louvre? I went through that place in 20 minutes.
name: Peter Falk

quote: Being famous hasn't changed my perception of myself - I've just grown up.
name: Cat Deeley

quote: I never wanted to be rich or successful or famous. I just wanted to be happy and have fun.
name: Donna Leon

quote: You can get awful famous in this country in seven days.
name: Gary Hart

quote: I don't like the idea of famous people.
name: Kristin Hersh

quote: I was very famous as a young man and I celebrated both the good and bad times with drinking.
name: Glenn Hughes

quote: Indy makes the race driver. You become famous when you come here.
name: Rodger Ward

quote: I made myself famous by writing 'songs' and lyrics about the beauty of the things I did and ugliness, too.
name: Jack Kerouac

quote: Being famous is great, it's not like bad or horrible or anything.
name: Dave Chappelle

quote: Famous, adj.: Conspicuously miserable.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I've been famous my entire life; I don't know any other way.
name: Cher

quote: I'm so famous, people expect me to sell as many records as Celine Dion or Puff Daddy.
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: I wanted to be successful, not famous.
name: George Harrison

quote: You have to pretend that your life is a financial pleasure even when your autographs are bouncing.
name: Kinky Friedman

quote: People just assume that if you're famous, you're in Hollywood.
name: Megan Fox

quote: I am famous because I am an African American jazz artist.
name: Nat King Cole

quote: My goal was never to be famous, but to be a consistently working actor.
name: Erin Cummings

quote: Sometimes I'm fascinated with how famous my work could be while I'm not so famous.
name: Frank Ocean

quote: I don't want to end up being a circus act, doing my most famous tricks when I'm 70.
name: Pharrell Williams

quote: I was the most famous kid in the United States. That was 1936.
name: Gore Vidal

quote: I didn't start out to become famous, so when it disappeared, I thought, well, that happens sometimes.
name: Leon Russell

quote: If you become famous and don't have a live show to back it up, they're not going to pay you any money.
name: Ron White

quote: I begged the universe to make me a famous comedian, and it did. So I tend not to ask for any more.
name: Ron White

quote: It's always a little mind-boggling to realize that these famous actors know who I am.
name: Emily Blunt

quote: I'm actually about as famous as a fourth division footballer from the 70s.
name: Dylan Moran

quote: I can do whatever I want - I'm rich, I'm famous, and I'm bigger than you.
name: Don Johnson

quote: Wanting to be an actor and wanting to be famous are different.
name: Blake Lively

quote: For now I'm just enjoying being a mom. I don't want to be more famous and more rich. I want to be a good mom.
name: Jewel

quote: There's so much made of the exceptional and the celebrity, the famous, and the wannabees.
name: Andrew Clements

quote: Public misbehavior by the famous is a powerful teaching tool.
name: Bill O'Reilly

quote: I'm famous. That's my job.
name: Jerry Rubin

quote: A window covered with raindrops interests me more than a photograph of a famous person.
name: Saul Leiter

quote: I think that people who are famous tend to be underdeveloped in their humanity skills.
name: Diane Keaton

quote: I can deal with it now, but 13 is a tough age to be recognized and famous. It's a tough age, period.
name: Bill Skarsgard

quote: People are much more inclined to believe and say bad things about you if you're famous.
name: Danielle Steel

quote: If I had never gotten famous or rich, I think I'd be equally neurotic.
name: Ray Romano

quote: I know really, really famous people who are terrified every time they walk on to a stage.
name: Bill Nighy

quote: I really hate the duties of being a celebrity, like getting dressed up for the red carpet.
name: America Ferrera

quote: It's not my goal to be a famous actor.
name: Gavin DeGraw

quote: I'm supposed to be famous, but I don't think I like it so much.
name: Caster Semenya

quote: I wanted to be famous; I wanted to perform. Those things I really, really wanted more than anything else.
name: Laverne Cox

quote: I think being famous is more of a hindrance, a constraint, than just letting yourself be free.
name: Martin Yan

quote: All the girls today want to be famous, but they haven't earned their spurs.
name: C. Z. Guest

quote: I don't know if any famous people follow me, but their daughters definitely do.
name: Lucky Blue Smith

quote: I love meeting famous people. I'm even happy just looking at them.
name: Joey McIntyre

quote: I don't need a lot of attention. I'd much rather have the work be famous than the face be famous.
name: Jeff MacNelly

quote: I'd probably be famous now if I wasn't such a good waitress.
name: Jane Siberry

quote: Blogs are easy to start, but unless the author is famous, it takes years to build a following.
name: Adam D'Angelo

quote: If there's anything more mortifying than being famous at 14, it's being washed up right after.
name: Moon Unit Zappa

quote: I have never had the ambition to be famous for nothing. You have to do something with your life.
name: Gabriella Wilde

quote: It's not like I'm that wildly famous that it's disrupted my lifestyle in some way.
name: Mariana Klaveno

quote: Sometimes people offer you plays, they offer you parts, but they only offer it because I'm famous.
name: Chris Rock

quote: And even though I'm famous, I still go through things that young people go through.
name: Khalid

quote: People will ask, 'Are you famous?' And I always answer, 'My mother thinks so.'
name: Yo-Yo Ma

quote: I made my living being 20 or 30 pounds heavier than the average model. And that's where I got famous.
name: Tyra Banks

quote: I'm actually a very private person. Sometimes I'm in denial that I'm really famous.
name: Britney Spears

quote: I really feel like it's a travesty to make a child famous. I really do.
name: Joe Rogan

quote: I had a sense of who I was before I got famous.
name: Joe Rogan

quote: I'm the man that made wrestling famous.
name: Hulk Hogan

quote: There is this power that comes with being famous.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: Whether we are famous or not, we all need God. We also need other people.
name: Chuck Norris

quote: It isn't necessary to be rich and famous to be happy. It's only necessary to be rich.
name: Alan Alda

quote: Whenever you're the child of a famous person, you get judged in odd ways because of that.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: Know the names of past and current artists who are most famous for playing their instruments.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: I know I'm not supposed to have any opinions about politics, because I'm famous.
name: Cher

quote: The problem is, the more famous you get, the more people see you who didn't choose to.
name: Louis C. K.

quote: I admire sensible, kind people. They're not often famous.
name: John Malkovich

quote: I am a celebrity, and it feels good to be famous.
name: Karan Patel

quote: I feel like everyone has the right to privacy, even if you're the most famous person in the world.
name: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: My hair was famous before I was.
name: Christopher Walken

quote: After a fellow gets famous it doesn't take long for someone to bob up that used to sit by him in school.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: I think anyone who is famous is a moron if they're on Twitter. It's just stupid.
name: George Clooney

quote: If I wanted to be famous, I could have been famous before.
name: David Gest

quote: I wasn't trying to be famous when I started making music. I mean, that wasn't the first thing I wanted.
name: G-Dragon

quote: I want to eat, cook, meet famous people and make fun of them.
name: Roseanne Barr

quote: When you become a celebrity, the world owns you and your image.
name: Megan Fox

quote: I've never sat there and plotted out how I was going to become successful or famous.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Do you remember the wrestler Andre the Giant? Famous. He had acromegaly.
name: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: The celebrity is a person who is known for his well-knownness.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Britain is famous for being great at inventing and poor at commercializing.
name: Margaret Heffernan

quote: Luckily, I think, I never really wanted to be famous, I just wanted to make movies.
name: Seth Rogen

quote: The good thing about L.A. is that there's always someone more famous 100 yards away from me.
name: Seth Rogen

quote: I bemoan the fact that all my famous friends have places in St. Bart's and I have to go to Montauk.
name: Rufus Wainwright

quote: I just think Rosa Parks was overrated. Last time I checked, she got famous for breaking the law.
name: Stephen Colbert

quote: I am not a name-dropper. I can't help it if everybody I know is famous.
name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: I wanted to be famous. I wanted people to talk about me.
name: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: It doesn't matter what famous person I've come across in the street, I don't think I've ever shouted.
name: Lewis Hamilton

quote: Sometimes a famous subject may even outlive his own obituary writer.
name: Walter Cronkite

quote: I don't know what 'famous' is, really.
name: Karl Pilkington

quote: I wanted to go hide. I wasn't looking to be more famous, I'm famous enough.
name: Howard Stern

quote: You're not famous until my mother has heard of you.
name: Jay Leno

quote: Celebrity damages private life.
name: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: I mean I was famous for nothing.
name: Rick Springfield

quote: Duke Ellington was famous for hs very original harmonic patterns.
name: Lawrence Welk

quote: There are two types of actors: those who say they don't want to be famous, and those who are liars.
name: Kevin Bacon

quote: I thought the more famous I became, the more friendships I would have, but the opposite was true.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: Only traumatised people want to be famous.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: I liked myself much more before I got famous. I was much friendlier and had more energy.
name: Sia

quote: I appreciate my music is famous, but I'd rather my face wasn't so that I can just live a normal life.
name: Sia

quote: I got a little bit famous. I didn't like it.
name: Sia

quote: Why am I so famous? What am I doing right? What are the others doing wrong?
name: Barbra Streisand

quote: I earned my famous name.
name: Brian Wilson

quote: I didn't like noisy cinemas when I wasn't famous.
name: Ricky Gervais

quote: When I was growing up, I thought I'd be a lot happier if I was famous and successful and if I had money.
name: Russell Brand

quote: I do promotion because I want to do art. I don't do the art because I want to be famous.
name: Kerli

quote: The whole celebrity culture thing - I'm fascinated by, and repelled by, and yet I end up knowing about it.
name: Anderson Cooper

quote: To not see black or Latina women as famous in my industry is crazy! I have to talk about it.
name: Ashley Graham

quote: People hate me because I am a multifaceted, talented, wealthy, internationally famous genius.
name: Jerry Lewis

quote: Tom Cruise, he's a lot more famous than me.
name: David Beckham

quote: I'm fortunate to be famous for two rather imposing characters like Magneto and Gandalf.
name: Ian Mckellen

quote: I was famous overnight. I went from nowhere to being really big.
name: Sting

quote: My most famous commercial was for Fruit Of the Loom underwear. I took a lot of razzing from my classmates.
name: Ian Ziering

quote: Nothing in life prepares you to be famous.
name: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: Brooklyn was a famous team. I wanted to play for the Dodgers.
name: Roberto Clemente

quote: I only wanted to be a songwriter. I never wanted to be a singer. And I never wanted to be famous.
name: Carole King

quote: I absolutely loved being famous. It was all great, up until the point when it wasn't.
name: Noel Gallagher

quote: Anything that's of any use, famous people get hold of it and take it for themselves and it gets a bad rap.
name: Noel Gallagher

quote: I never wanted to be famous.
name: Dave Attell

quote: I get recognized, but I'm not really a famous famous.
name: Dave Attell

quote: There are a lot of good things about being famous but there are a few not so good things too.
name: Sharon Stone

quote: I've had offers that could've made me much richer and much more famous than I am.
name: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: My famous line is 'Product is king.'
name: Joy Mangano

quote: It's interesting because people assume that because I'm famous I know all famous people.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: What I do is what I like; if I'm not as famous as I'd like to be, I've done it to myself.
name: Blake Shelton

quote: I have some idea of the pressure of finding your own identity with a famous father.
name: Michael Douglas

quote: I don't do the whole, 'Put my name on it, make me famous' thing.
name: T-Pain

quote: Being in 'Us Weekly' does not make you famous.
name: Bradley Cooper

quote: I got the famous Oprah hug!
name: Taylor Lautner

quote: The sound of my voice is more famous than me.
name: Jimmy Iovine

quote: I seek no longer to be a 'famous' person, and instead I wish to live a 'normal' life.
name: Sinead O'Connor

quote: Nobody prepares you for what happens when you get famous, and I didn't handle it well.
name: Chevy Chase

quote: I would have changed my last name if being famous were my goal.
name: Zach Galifianakis

quote: You can't date if you're famous. That's how it seems to me.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: I don't feel famous.
name: Uma Thurman

quote: I think I'll always be famous. I just hope I don't become infamous.
name: CeeLo Green

quote: Apart from its famous healing properties, manuka has a strong, woody flavour.
name: Yotam Ottolenghi

quote: I want to be famous everywhere.
name: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: My father always had people around the house who were famous psychics.
name: Natalie Massenet

quote: The fire in the belly is essential, otherwise you become Michael Buble - famous and meaningless.
name: Morrissey

quote: A famous love story is hard to maintain when you both live in the spotlight.
name: Lauren Bacall

quote: I became famous almost before I had a craft.
name: Farrah Fawcett

quote: Once you become famous, there is nothing left to become but infamous.
name: Don Johnson

quote: When a place advertises itself as 'World Famous,' you may be sure it isn't.
name: Herb Caen

quote: I have been very happy, very rich, very beautiful, much adulated, very famous and very unhappy.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: It's nice to have famous people love you.
name: Millie Bobby Brown

quote: At first, I thoroughly enjoyed being famous.
name: Phil Donahue

quote: Famous people complain about fame, but they never want to give it back, myself included.
name: Erica Jong

quote: I wanted to be a rich, famous rock-and-roll star in that order.
name: Dee Snider

quote: The day before I was famous in Denmark, nobody looked my way. The day after, everybody wanted to talk to me.
name: Mads Mikkelsen

quote: Nobody sane wants just to be famous.
name: Jamie Dornan

quote: It is a mark of many famous people that they cannot part with their brightest hour.
name: Lillian Hellman

quote: I put out my first song with no intentions of being famous.
name: Ravyn Lenae

quote: Face it, I didn't become famous until I took my clothes off.
name: Jude Law

quote: Celebrity distorts democracy by giving the rich, beautiful, and famous more authority than they deserve.
name: Maureen Dowd

quote: It was never in my mind to be famous.
name: Francois Nars

quote: Being a famous actress may give you a sense of being important, but believe me, it's just an illusion.
name: Juliette Binoche

quote: When you're as famous as I am, stories take on a life of their own.
name: Norman Wisdom

quote: Everywhere you look, especially on TV, someone is promising to make you rich and famous.
name: Diego Luna

quote: Ever since grammar school, I knew I wanted to be famous - I always wanted to be a singer.
name: Jennifer Hudson

quote: The advantage of taking pictures of the famous is that they get published.
name: Elliott Erwitt

quote: Never, never have a famous partner. It's too complicated.
name: Robyn Davidson

quote: You know, the more I appear on newspapers, the more famous I become.
name: Brenda Fassie

quote: I've always been successful. Now I'm famous and successful.
name: Chazz Palminteri

quote: I like celebrities. I love people who are famous. Always have.
name: Elaine Stritch

quote: I don't really consider myself to be famous.
name: Victoria Justice

quote: I didn't want kids to think that to be happy, they had to be famous or rich or live in the big city.
name: Dan Savage

quote: I'd always tell my mom, 'I want to be famous like Claudia Schiffer or Brigitte Bardot.'
name: Charlotte McKinney

quote: After becoming famous, I've realised how overrated fame is. It gets in the way of normal life.
name: Ranveer Singh

quote: Celebrity gives us delusion of self importance.
name: Al Goldstein

quote: Celebrity is the advantage of being known to people who we don't know, and who don't know us.
name: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: The Kardashians can be famous for being famous. What do they do? I can't figure it out.
name: Larry King

quote: I get very nervous around famous people and I get nervous around beautiful women.
name: Liev Schreiber

quote: I've worked with a lot of people who are more famous than myself who are terribly insecure.
name: Barry Gibb

quote: I don't want to be famous as a movie star and have the whole world love me, I want to be a creative actress.
name: Juliette Lewis

quote: I've never really cared if I was famous for my music. It was just something I had to do.
name: Juliette Lewis

quote: I could have been more famous if I did all the glitzy things, but celebrity always seemed so unnecessary.
name: Enya

quote: If you are famous, you should find someone who understands your profession but doesn't do it.
name: Ashlan Gorse Cousteau

quote: Vidal Sassoon was the most famous hairstylist in the history of the world.
name: John Paul DeJoria

quote: The thing about being famous is, it's weird. The only people who get how weird it is are other famous people.
name: Margot Kidder

quote: When you're in a relationship with a very famous person, you have to make compromises.
name: David Furnish

quote: I wrote because I needed to and wanted to. It never occurred to me that I'd become famous.
name: Danielle Steel

quote: It took being famous to make me cool, which, by the way, I never forgot.
name: Rob Lowe

quote: By no means do I try to go out and hang out with famous people.
name: Brad Paisley

quote: I'm somebody who likes to gravitate toward people who aren't necessarily famous.
name: Brad Paisley

quote: Being famous is not something that would make me feel successful - unless one was striving for mediocrity.
name: William Hurt

quote: The idea of being famous is a lot better than the reality.
name: Tom Felton

quote: Fame - anyone who says he doesn't like it is crazy.
name: Bennett Cerf

quote: I never wanted to be the most famous, the most beautiful, the most extravagant.
name: Manolo Blahnik

quote: I'd wanted to be famous for as long as I could remember.
name: Zach Anner

quote: I'm not a very good impersonator, my friends maybe, but not famous people.
name: Diane Kruger

quote: I've never been one for crushing on famous people.
name: Daisy Ridley

quote: I'm the guy that made Joe DiMaggio famous.
name: Lefty Gomez

quote: I am not famous at all.
name: Sam Taylor-Johnson

quote: People didn't go on YouTube to get famous back when I started.
name: Colleen Ballinger

quote: Celebrity means that I can affect people in a positive way.
name: David Hasselhoff

quote: I don't see myself as famous at all so I'm continuing my life as normal.
name: Ashley Madekwe

quote: I can't see any value in being a celebrity, famous for being famous.
name: Noomi Rapace

quote: Sometimes being famous gets in the way of doing what you want to do.
name: Johnny Mathis

quote: My summer reading suggestion: Pick a really famous, really long novel.
name: Maria Semple

quote: I do not like being famous. I like being normal.
name: Vince Gill

quote: I've always been more drawn to being normal than being famous.
name: Vince Gill

quote: I like being famous when it's convenient for me and completely anonymous when it's not.
name: Catherine Deneuve

quote: And I want to be able to - you know, make Republicans and Democrats famous for keeping jobs in California.
name: Meg Whitman

quote: Most of my life I have played a lot of famous people but most of them were dead so you have a poetic license.
name: Christopher Plummer

quote: I can never really enjoy being famous.
name: Utada Hikaru

quote: The Stepover definitely made me famous. The thing with Allen Iverson is, he made me.
name: Tyronn Lue

quote: I put my money in the bank: I have to think of life after modeling, when I'm not famous any more.
name: Eva Herzigova

quote: And my marriage was perfect when I wasn't famous.
name: Damon Wayans

quote: I never thought about being famous.
name: Damon Wayans

quote: Famous crime stories almost always lead to the passing of new laws.
name: Bill James

quote: For me, I never, never, from the moment I started acting, had a desire to be famous.
name: Carla Gugino

quote: You can get rich or famous by doing the same thing.
name: Ang Lee

quote: Just because you're not famous, doesn't mean you're not good.
name: Laura Linney

quote: I don't want to be famous for being famous.
name: Kelli O'Hara

quote: The stalkers can get a little scary at times, but I guess all these things are a part of being famous.
name: Armaan Malik

quote: Being big and famous doesn't get you more freedom, it gets you less.
name: Robert Wyatt

quote: I've got something to live for, because I always wanted to be an artist; I always wanted to be famous.
name: Daniel Johnston

quote: When I was younger, I used to say, One day I'll be famous.
name: Katie Price

quote: You know, one of the biggest thrills I have is when famous people recognize me from Taxi.
name: Marilu Henner

quote: I am beautiful, famous and gorgeous.
name: Anna Kournikova

quote: Indeed, wretched the man whose fame makes his misfortunes famous.
name: Lucius Accius

quote: I've played with some very famous bandits in my time on the celebrity golf circuit.
name: Jasper Carrott

quote: Celebrity, to me, is not a thing to seek.
name: Aidan Quinn

quote: I'm not one of those famous people flying round the world emoting over every catastrophe. I'm too feeble.
name: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: But I don't feel the need to be famous.
name: Jessica Alba

quote: Being famous is wicked. But it's better to be normal.
name: Rupert Grint

quote: Here at Z100, we're kind of famous for breaking new artists and watching their careers bloom.
name: Elvis Duran

quote: There is no celebrity quite as powerful as the local, homegrown celebrity.
name: Tony Wilson

quote: I mostly go under the radar, which is fantastic because I would not be a good famous person.
name: Gillian Flynn

quote: Save your rejections so that later when you are famous you can show them to people and laugh.
name: Meg Cabot

quote: I admire how Tarantino finds music that's semifamiliar and not famous: undiscovered gems.
name: Rod Lurie

quote: Even famous poets such as Marianne Moore and William Carlos Williams were rarely asked to read their poems.
name: Donald Hall

quote: I felt so painfully isolated that I vowed I would get revenge on the world by becoming a famous cartoonist.
name: Robert Crumb

quote: In a lot of aspects it's cooler that we don't have a lot of really overly famous people in the band.
name: Neal Schon

quote: Some people don't care why they are famous; they just want to be famous, and that makes my skin crawl a bit.
name: George Ezra

quote: Fame, I have already. Now I need the money.
name: Wilhelm Steinitz
